## Overview of the Government Tender Announcement
### Title
Title: Elder Services
### Reference Number
Reference number: PW-22-01019021

### Description of the Project
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is soliciting proposals from interested Indigenous Suppliers to provide Elder services to assist Indigenous offenders to further develop an understanding of traditional Indigenous culture.

### Objective
The CSC aims to provide programs and opportunities to meet the needs of Indigenous offenders and contribute to their rehabilitation.

### Scope of Work
The successful Indigenous Supplier will be responsible for providing the following services:

* Spiritual and ceremonial services to Indigenous offenders, including counseling, teachings, and conducting traditional ceremonies based on their teachings.
* Providing advice and guidance to staff and management on issues of Indigenous spirituality and cultural practices.
* Participating in case conferences and providing verbally or in writing updates on the offender's progress to the Case Management Team.

### Requirements
* The Indigenous Supplier must be recognized by their community as an Elder/Cultural Advisor.
* The Indigenous Supplier must have a minimum of five (5) years of experience in delivering spiritual and cultural services and teachings to Indigenous people.
* The Indigenous Supplier must be familiar with and able to conduct a variety of ceremonies with a focus on healing according to their own teachings.
* The Indigenous Supplier must be able to provide guidance to staff and offenders regarding the protocols surrounding the use, disposition, and searching of traditional medicines and spiritual effects.

### Application Process
Suppliers interested in providing Elder Services to the CSC must submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice by January 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM CST.

### Deadline
The closing date and time for accepting statements of capabilities is January 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM CST.

### Contact Information
For inquiries and statement of capabilities, please contact Janet Nelson at 306-659-9300 or [501contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:501contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca).

### Contract Period
The contract duration is 4 years, from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2027, with a estimated value of $365,064.70 (GST/HST extra).
